TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemEvents extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供存取系統事件告知的功能。

span.span: Provides access to system event notifications.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供特定類型的系統事件回應的能力。The class provides the ability to respond to specific types of system events. 系統事件引發時，使用系統事件的執行緒，可監視稱為任何附加至事件的委派。When a system event is raised, any delegates attached to the event are called using the thread that monitors for system events. 因此，您應該要從您事件處理常式安全執行緒的任何呼叫。Therefore, you should make any calls from your event handlers thread-safe. 如果您需要呼叫不會公開這個類別的成員身分的系統事件，您可以使用方法。If you need to call a system event that is not exposed as a member of this class, you can use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 不會引發的系統事件處理常式，因為它可能會讓其他應用程式無法正常運作的執行緒上會執行耗時的處理。Do not perform time-consuming processing on the thread that raises a system event handler because it might prevent other applications from functioning. > [!NOTE] > 某些系統事件可能不會引發在[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]。Some system events might not be raised on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]. 請務必確認您的應用程式運作如預期般在[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]。Be sure to verify that your application works as expected on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何使用一般的應用程式中的系統事件，第二個範例示範如何使用 Windows 服務中的系統事件。The first example shows how to use system events in an ordinary application, and the second example shows how to use system events in a Windows service. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例會註冊在某些系統事件的感興趣，然後等候這些事件發生的任何。The following code example registers interest in some system events and then waits for any of those events to occur. 如果使用者變更顯示器解析度，就會發生所顯示的輸出。The output shown occurs if the user changes the display resolution. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列程式碼範例示範非常簡單的 Windows 服務，可處理和事件。The following code example demonstrates a very simple Windows service that handles the and events. 此範例也包含名為的服務`SimpleService`，表單名為`HiddenForm`，和安裝程式。The example includes a service named `SimpleService`, a form named `HiddenForm`, and an installer. 此表單會提供所需的系統事件的訊息迴圈。The form provides the message loop that is required by system events. > [!NOTE] > 服務沒有訊息迴圈，除非它們可與桌面互動。Services do not have message loops, unless they are allowed to interact with the desktop. 如果訊息迴圈未提供所隱藏的表單，如同此範例中，服務必須是本機系統帳戶執行，並手動介入的情況下，才可啟用與桌面互動。If the message loop is not provided by a hidden form, as in this example, the service must be run under the local system account, and manual intervention is required to enable interaction with the desktop. 也就是系統管理員必須手動檢查**允許服務與桌面互動** 核取方塊**登入**服務的 內容 對話方塊索引標籤。That is, the administrator must manually check the **Allow service to interact with desktop** check box on the **Log On** tab of the service properties dialog box. 在此情況下，會自動提供的訊息迴圈。In that case, a message loop is automatically provided. 只有在本機系統帳戶下執行服務時，才使用此選項。This option is available only when the service is run under the local system account. 無法以程式設計方式啟用與桌面互動。Interaction with the desktop cannot be enabled programmatically. 此範例中的服務會啟動執行執行個體的執行緒`HiddenForm`。The service in this example starts a thread that runs an instance of `HiddenForm`. 連接事件，並且在表單中的處理。The events are hooked up and handled in the form. 事件必須在 load 事件中的表單，以確定表單是完全載入第一次; 連接否則將不會引發事件。The events must be hooked up in the load event of the form, to make sure that the form is completely loaded first; otherwise the events will not be raised. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例將提供所有必要的程式碼，包括通常是由 Visual Studio 設計工具產生的表單初始化程式碼。The example provides all the necessary code, including the form initialization code typically generated by Visual Studio designers. 如果您正在開發您的服務，在 Visual Studio 中，您可以省略第二個部分類別，並使用**屬性**視窗設定為零，要的框線樣式，隱藏表單的寬度與高度，和要的視窗狀態.If you are developing your service in Visual Studio, you can omit the second partial class and use the **Properties** window to set the height and width of the hidden form to zero, the border style to , and the window state to . 若要執行範例：To run the example: 1. 從命令列程式碼編譯。Compile the code from the command line. 您使用的原始程式檔的名稱並不重要。The name that you use for the source file is not important. 2. 安裝服務，從命令列使用[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)公用程式。Install the service from the command line using the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) utility. 例如，`InstallUtil example.exe`原始程式檔名稱是否`example.cs`或`example.vb`。For example, `InstallUtil example.exe` if the source file name is `example.cs` or `example.vb`. 您必須是系統管理員才能安裝此服務。You must be an administrator to install the service. 3. 您可以使用 [服務] 主控台來啟動服務。Use the Services console to start the service. 4. 變更系統時間，或變更使用者的喜好設定，例如滑鼠屬性。Change the system time, or change user preferences, such as mouse properties. 5. 檢視中的訊息**應用程式**事件檢視器類別。View the messages in the **Application** category of Event Viewer. 6. 您可以使用 [服務] 主控台來停止服務。Use the Services console to stop the service. 7. 從命令列解除安裝服務，使用`/u`選項。Uninstall the service from the command line by using the `/u` option. 例如，`InstallUtil /u example.exe`。For example, `InstallUtil /u example.exe`. [!code-csharp[ManagedWindowsService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ManagedWindowsService/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ManagedWindowsService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ManagedWindowsService/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: .
Associated state:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig native int CreateTimer(int32 interval) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateTimer (interval As Integer) As IntPtr

param.name: interval
param.span: 指定計時器告知的間隔時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Specifies the interval between timer notifications, in milliseconds.

summary.span: 建立與系統事件視窗關聯的新視窗計時器。

span.span: Creates a new window timer associated with the system events window.
The ID of the new timer.

exception.span: 間隔是小於或等於零。

span.span: The interval is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的動作失敗，或建立計時器的動作失敗。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed, or the attempt to create the timer did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event DisplaySettingsChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當使用者變更顯示設定時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the display settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何監視事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event DisplaySettingsChanging As EventHandler

summary.span: 當顯示設定變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the display settings are changing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event EventsThreadShutdown As EventHandler

summary.span: 在聆聽系統事件的執行緒終止前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the thread that listens for system events is terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為接聽系統事件的執行緒即將終止時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised as the thread that listens for system events is about to be terminated. 系統事件的委派，會使用接聽系統事件的執行緒叫用的。System event delegates are invoked using the thread that listens for system events. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

summary.span: 當使用者將字型加入系統或從系統移除字型時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user adds fonts to or removes fonts from the system.

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void InvokeOnEventsThread(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Shared Sub InvokeOnEventsThread (method As Delegate)

param.name: method
param.span: 要用接聽系統事件的執行緒叫用的委派。

span.span: A delegate to invoke using the thread that listens for system events.

summary.span: 利用接聽系統事件的執行緒叫用指定的委派。

span.span: Invokes the specified delegate using the thread that listens for system events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法時，您需要處理系統事件不會公開否則類別。You can use this method any time that you need to handle a system event that is not exposed otherwise by the class. 當您呼叫這個方法時，您的應用程式用來處理系統事件的執行緒就會叫用指定的委派。When you call this method, the specified delegate will be invoked by the thread that your application is using to process system events.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed, or the attempt to terminate the timer did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event LowMemory As EventHandler

summary.span: 當系統可用的 RAM 不足時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the system is running out of available RAM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會包裝 WM_COMPACTING 訊息。This event wraps the WM_COMPACTING message. 此訊息會傳送給所有最上層的視窗中，當系統偵測到超過 12.5%的系統時間，在 30 至 60 秒的間隔內花在壓縮的記憶體。This message is sent to all top-level windows when the system detects more than 12.5 percent of system time over a 30- to 60-second interval is being spent compacting memory. 這表示系統記憶體過低。This indicates that system memory is low. > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

para.span: 此訊息僅為 16 位元 Windows 為基礎的應用程式相容性提供。

span.span: This message is provided only for compatibility with 16-bit Windows-based applications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event PaletteChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當使用者切換至使用不同調色盤的應用程式時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user switches to an application that uses a different palette.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何監視事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event SessionSwitch As SessionSwitchEventHandler

summary.span: 當目前登入的使用者變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the currently logged-in user has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event TimeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當使用者變更系統時鐘上的時間時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the time on the system clock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 目前內容不支援系統事件告知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，伺服器處理序可能就不支援全域系統事件告知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 建立系統事件視窗執行緒的嘗試未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event TimerElapsed As TimerElapsedEventHandler

summary.span: 當視窗計時器間隔已經過期時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a windows timer interval has expired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event UserPreferenceChanged As UserPreferenceChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 當使用者喜好設定已變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a user preference has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event UserPreferenceChanging As UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 當使用者喜好設定正在變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a user preference is changing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果在執行訊息幫浦，只會引發這個事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服務中，除非使用隱藏的表單，或手動啟動訊息幫浦，否則將不會引發此事件。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 如需示範如何在 Windows 服務中使用隱藏的表單處理系統事件的程式碼範例，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這是靜態事件，您必須在您的應用程式已處置，或會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何監視事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]
